name: yumm
description: Home page ­ Simple feed of the posts and recipes in date order ­ For posts show: Title, date, and a short snippet. ­ Clicking on a post snippet expands the post inline. Clicking on the title takes you to the post page. ­ For recipes show: Name, thumbnail ­ List of recipe categories Blog post ­ Show all fields Recipe ­ Show all fields ­ The category should be a link to the categories page Category page ­ List of recipes in that category in date order ­ Same presentation as home page
